languages.text: "Мне нравится смотреть на него. Страдающий, беспомощный, такой... уютный. А когда он начинает хрипеть свои угрозы..."

traits.locale_text: "Мне нравится смотреть на него. Страдающий, беспомощный, такой... уютный. А когда он начинает хрипеть свои угрозы..."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"
languages.original_text: "Мне нравится смотреть на него. Страдающий, беспомощный, такой... уютный. А когда он начинает хрипеть свои угрозы..."

traits.locale_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

traits.locale_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: “我喜欢看着他，他是如此痛苦、无助，如此……令人满足。而且，每当他用那微弱、嘶哑的声音威胁我的时候——”
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: “我喜欢看着他，他是如此痛苦、无助，如此……令人满足。而且，每当他用那微弱、嘶哑的声音威胁我的时候——”
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: «Me gusta verle así. Sufriendo, indefenso es... reconfortante. Y cuando intenta amenazarme entre jadeos...».
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: «Me gusta verle así. Sufriendo, indefenso es... reconfortante. Y cuando intenta amenazarme entre jadeos...».
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: 「こいつを見ていると楽しい。苦難に満ち、無力で…とても心地いい。小さく、かすれた声で私を脅しはじめると、なんともいえない感情が――」
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: 「こいつを見ていると楽しい。苦難に満ち、無力で…とても心地いい。小さく、かすれた声で私を脅しはじめると、なんともいえない感情が――」
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ich sehe ihn gerne an. Wie er leidet, hilflos, so ... tröstlich. Und wenn er anfängt, mich in dieser kleine, krächzenden Stimme zu bedrohen ..."
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: "Ich sehe ihn gerne an. Wie er leidet, hilflos, so ... tröstlich. Und wenn er anfängt, mich in dieser kleine, krächzenden Stimme zu bedrohen ..."
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: « Je prends plaisir à l'observer. Sa souffrance, son impuissance... Ça me fait chaud au cœur. Et quand il se met à me menacer avec sa petite voix éraillée... »
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: « Je prends plaisir à l'observer. Sa souffrance, son impuissance... Ça me fait chaud au cœur. Et quand il se met à me menacer avec sa petite voix éraillée... »
traits.speaker: DrukhariSslyth_MeleeRanged_Anger

languages.text: "Ona bakmak hoşuma gidiyor. Acı içinde, kimsesiz... Öyle rahatlatıcı ki. Bir de o sevimli, hışırtılı sesiyle savurduğu tehditler yok mu..."
languages.original_text: "I like looking at him. Suffering, helpless, so... comforting. And when he starts threatening me in that little rasping voice—"

traits.locale_text: "Ona bakmak hoşuma gidiyor. Acı içinde, kimsesiz... öyle rahatlatıcı ki. Bir de o sevimli, hışırtılı sesiyle savurduğu tehditler yok mu..."
